purpose: Pre-paper-trading verification of ACI 1.0 architecture completeness

blocking_items: Agent Rivalry (CRIO vs CSEO) NOT IMPLEMENTED
executive_summary.recommendation: DO NOT ACTIVATE PAPER TRADING until critical gaps resolved

macro_indicators.note: Data exists in research schema, serving table empty

freshness_tracking.note: Timestamps exist but no systematic freshness gating

A_perception_layer.gap: Lineage log empty - cannot prove data provenance

agent_rivalry.note: CRIO and CSEO exist but NO rivalry/debate mechanism implemented

B_interpretation_layer.aci_requirement: Agent rivalry where each agent rewarded for disproving the other
B_interpretation_layer.gap: NO ADVERSARIAL DEBATE - CRIO operates alone, CSEO not activated

confidence_gating.note: No hard enforcement of confidence < 0.70 blocking trades

freshness_gating.note: No hard enforcement of data_freshness > 12h blocking trades

C_decision_layer.aci_requirement: Justification gating - no trade without sufficient confidence/freshness
C_decision_layer.gap: LIDS thresholds defined in spec but NOT ENFORCED in code

D_reflection_layer.aci_requirement: Automatic regret computation and parameter mutation proposals

E_risl_layer.aci_requirement: Chaos injection to test DEFCON response before real capital
E_risl_layer.gap: ZERO CHAOS TESTS EXECUTED - robustness unverified

ACL_agent_rivalry.gap: Agents exist but operate independently - no adversarial structure

LIDS_epistemic_budgeting.gap: Thresholds exist in documentation but NO runtime enforcement

reflection_regret_to_rule.gap: Pipeline exists but NEVER EXECUTES - no learning loop

risl_antifragility.gap: System has never been stress-tested with synthetic failures

court_proof_evidence_chain.gap: CANNOT PROVE ANY CLAIM - court-proof requirement completely unfulfilled
court_proof_evidence_chain.ceo_directive_violated: CEO Directive 2025-12-20: No Summary Without Raw Query Evidence

finn_epistemic_posture.assessment: FINN has been mostly blind - only recent Phase 1+2 calibrations produced OBSERVED_DATA

blocking_requirements_for_paper_trading.action: Add hard gate: if confidence < 0.70, reject signal
Implement summary_evidence_ledger population in FINN/STIG pipelines
Execute at least 3 Protocol Omega chaos scenarios
Implement IoS-008 CRIO vs CSEO debate mechanism

ceo_decision_required.question: Do we proceed with paper trading despite ACI 1.0 gaps, or resolve blocking items first?

options.description: Resolve P0 blockers before paper trading
Proceed with paper trading, accept gaps as technical debt
options.risk: HIGH - learning loop disabled, cannot prove claims, no antifragility

options.description: Partial activation - shadow-only observation, no paper execution
options.risk: MEDIUM - observation without action, slower path to economic freedom

ceo_decision_required.stig_recommendation: Option A - ACI 1.0 was designed to prevent premature action. Activating paper trading without the learning loop means we cannot self-correct. Economic freedom requires earned confidence, not rushed execution.
